name: Finanssiala ry - Finance Finland
goal: Professional organisation which represents banks, insurers, finance houses, securities dealers, fund management companies and financial employers operating in Finland.
interests: Budget, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , General and Institutional Affairs, Home Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: Financial services regulation including banking, insurance, securities, investment funds sectors.
